sharepoint_onboarding_description: Whether you are in the office or on the go, share, edit and communicate with all your teams.
sharepoint_onboarding_description2: Explore all our ready-to-use, secure collaborative solutions.
sharepoint_onboarding_guide1_title: Enabling and managing your OVHcloud SharePoint
sharepoint_onboarding_guide1_description: Find out how to order and configure a SharePoint platform.
sharepoint_onboarding_guide2_title: Migrating your SharePoint via the OVHcloud Sharepoint Migrator
sharepoint_onboarding_guide2_description: Find out how to use the OVHcloud SharePoint Migrator interface.
